item.title: Chesscademy
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Chesscademy: Learn how to play chess online through videos, chess tactics, and chess games. I’ve never been particularly good at chess. Perhaps this is an opportunity to get better.
item.content:encoded:
Chesscademy:

Learn how to play chess online through videos, chess tactics, and chess games.

I’ve never been particularly good at chess. Perhaps this is an opportunity to get better.

item.title: Chess Pieces in Unicode
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: I was reading up on encoding issues and came across the chess symbols in Unicode Wikipedia page. I knew Unicode had support for all kinds of things, but chess pieces too? That was news to me. The Wikipedia entry included a codepoint and HTML entity table, which makes it easy to list out all of […]
item.content:encoded:
I was reading up on encoding issues and came across the chess symbols in Unicode Wikipedia page. I knew Unicode had support for all kinds of things, but chess pieces too? That was news to me.

The Wikipedia entry included a codepoint and HTML entity table, which makes it easy to list out all of the pieces:

White pieces:
♔ ♕ ♖ ♗ ♘ ♙

Black pieces:
♚ ♛ ♜ ♝ ♞ ♟
